ChunkText: consular processing means the change to h-1b will only take place after the h-1b is approved and the person leaves the us, applies for an h-1b visa, and returns to the US with the h-1b visa.
ContextBefore: if it is approved, your h-1b status does not actually take effect until october 1. two ways to change to h-1b: change of status and consular processing change of status means the petition is asking to change your status to h-1b in the us, without leaving the country.
ContextAfter: change of status considerations: please note, you can not travel outside the US while your h-1b application is pending through a change of status, or even after it is approved, before it becomes active on october 1. the next time you travel abroad after oct 1, you will need to apply for an h-1b visa stamp in your passport in order to return to the us.
